animeTitle: Kare Baka: Wagahai no Kare wa Baka de R
otherNames: Idiot Boyfriend: My Boyfriend is an Idiot, カレバカ～吾輩ノ彼ハ馬鹿でR～
synopsis: Centers around a girl named Akomi and her boyfriend Ponta Ninomiya. Ninomiya is a massive idiot who has no redeeming qualities aside from being really handsome. Follows the couple's everyday lives.
